text: Mariyama-putra isa balalena -- ''he allah‌! Amadera prabhu! Amadera jan'ya akasa theke khadya-paripurna khanca prerana karo, ya habe amadera jan'ya eka ida, -- amadera agragamidera jan'ya o pascadagamidera jan'ya, ara tomara kacha theke ekati nidarsana, ara amadera riyeka dana karo, kenana tumi'i riyekadatadera sarbottama.’’
